text:
HigherMe (YC W15) | Senior Backend and Full Stack | Toronto or Remote

We are looking for experienced engineers. The ideal candidates have experience with our stack (PHP/LARAVEL + REACT). Experience with the restaurant industry in any way is a plus.

HigherMe is a suite of hiring products modernizing how hiring is done in the antiquated world of restaurants/fast-food/hourly-employers.

We are backed by some of the best investors out there, including Y Combinator.

Apply at https://angel.co/higherme/jobs/235702-full-stack-developer

Please mention Hacker News in your application.
